long_description: Thanks to its comfortable upright riding position and 24 gears for steep streets, the GT Tachyon 3.0 bike is great for getting around town swiftly and comfortably. Aluminum frame features hydroformed and butted top and down tubes for enhanced strength and reduced weight; flat handlebar puts you in a comfortable, upright riding position. Speed Metal(R) aluminum fork offers rigid responsiveness for precise steering on city streets. FSA triple crankset is matched with Shimano shifters and derailleurs for reliable, responsive drivetrain performance across the 24 gear combinations. Sturdy wheels are outfitted with smooth-rolling Kenda Kwest tires for all-around riding in cities and on bike paths. Specs on the GT Tachyon 3.0 bike are subject to change.
short_description: Thanks to its comfortable upright riding position and 24 gears for steep streets, the GT Tachyon 3.0 bike is great for getting around town swiftly and comfortably.
